body_html:
Re-opening, since apparently you were referring to the C++ API. Sorry about that!

As @asimshankar suggested, you can define protocol buffers by linking in libtensorflow_framework.so. Everything else should come from libtensorflow_cc.so (or whatever you've renamed it to).
body_text:
Re-opening, since apparently you were referring to the C++ API. Sorry about that!
As @asimshankar suggested, you can define protocol buffers by linking in libtensorflow_framework.so. Everything else should come from libtensorflow_cc.so (or whatever you've renamed it to).
body:
Re-opening, since apparently you were referring to the C++ API. Sorry about that!

As @asimshankar suggested, you can define protocol buffers by linking in libtensorflow_framework.so. Everything else should come from libtensorflow_cc.so (or whatever you've renamed it to).
